item.title: End BC-17 East at TC-1 and BC-15
item.description: End BC-17 East at TC-1 and BC-15 in Surrey. Merge right for TC-1 East to Langley and Hope. Roadway becomes BC-15 South/176 St.

item.title: BC-17 East approaching TC-1
item.description: BC-17 East approaching TC-1 to Hope and Vancouver.

item.title: BC-17 East - 104 Ave
item.description: BC-17 East (South Fraser Perimeter Road) at 104 Ave. Continue east on BC-17 for BC-15 South to USA Border, TC-1 East to Hope, Langley, and Coquitlam.

item.title: Bridgeview Road north at BC-17
item.description: Bridgeview Road north at BC-17 in Surrey. Turn right for BC-17 East to TC-1 and Hope. Turn left for BC-17 West to Delta. Continue north on Bridgeview Road for 116 Ave.

item.title: King George Blvd. South at BC-17
item.description: King George Blvd. South at BC-17. Merge right for BC-17 west and Scott Road. Continue straight for King George Blvd. South to Surrey City Center, Langley, and BC-17 East.

item.title: BC-99 - Exit 26
item.description: BC-99 north at Exit 26 - BC-17 West/Tsawwassen/BC-17A/Ladner River Road. Continue north on BC-99 for Richmond and Vancouver. Use BC-17 West for the Tsawwassen Ferry Terminals.

item.title: BC-99 - Exit 26
item.description: BC-99 approaching Exit 26 - BC-17 West/Tsawwassen/To BC-17A/Ladner.
